name: Clipboard.Root
description: A component to copy text to the clipboard
description_zh: A component to copy text to the clipboard

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; input: string; label: string }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the clipboard. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 剪贴板中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

timeout.description: The timeout for the copy operation

value.description: The value to be copied to the clipboard

events.name: statusChange
events.description: The function to be called when the value is copied to the clipboard
events.description_zh: 将值复制到剪贴板时要调用的函数
